feature_model.name: View transaction
feature_model.feature_tree: :r View transaction (f_View_transaction) :m ATM software (f_ATM_software) :m User Interface (f_User_Interface) :m Change account password (f_Change_account_password) :m Banking functionality (f_Banking_functionality) :m Checking balance (f_Checking_balance) :m Withdrawn money (f_Withdrawn_money) :m Printing balance after withdrawal (f_Printing_balance_after_withdrawal) :o Local transfer to other banks (f_Local_transfer_to_other_banks) :g [1, *] : Detusch bank (f_Detusch_bank) : Volksbank (f_Volksbank) : Stadtparkasse (f_Stadtparkasse) :o Printing statement (f_Printing_statement) :o Local transfer to the same bank (f_Local_transfer_to_the_same_bank) :o Change maximum limit for withdrawal (f_Change_maximum_limit_for_withdrawal) :o International transfer (f_International_transfer) :o Deposit money (f_Deposit_money) :o Checking money exchange rate (f_Checking_money_exchange_rate) :o Money exchange (f_Money_exchange) :o Additional functionality (f_Additional_functionality) :o Pay the bills (f_Pay_the_bills) :o Mobile top-up (f_Mobile_top_up) :o Language selection (f_Language_selection) :g [1, 1] : English (f_English) : Italian (f_Italian) : German (f_German) : French (f_French) :g [1, 1] : Basic 2D view (f_Basic_2D_view) : Deluxe 3D view (f_Deluxe_3D_view)
